turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from my hotel room overseas and the connection isn't great.
Oh hello there, can you tell me your name again please? My ears aren't what they used to be.
Sure thing Grandpa, my name is Alex. Remember, it's a bit of an emergency I'm calling about actually. Can you hear me more clearly now?
Alex, that's right. Sorry about that, your voice just sounded so different with the accent and everything. What seems to be the emergency, dear?

Thanks for asking Grandpa. The thing is, I'm in a bit of trouble with some guys here and I really need your help. You see, I accidentally got into some legal issues but it's all sorted out now except for one small issueI can't pay my fines right away because they're pretty high and I don't have the funds on me. That's why I'm hoping you could maybe buy a few gift cards with the amount I owe? It'd be such a relief to get this over with. The amount is $4850, anything less would mean trouble for both of us. Can you do that for me, Grandpa? Please hurry as they're onto me and I need to settle everything within an hour.

Oh my, Alex! That does sound serious. Your grandma and I have been worried sick about you. Of course I want to help you out however I can. But... let me talk to your grandma first, okay? She's right here with me. We'll figure something out together, don't worry. Let's bring her on the line so we can discuss this properly.

That sounds good actually Grandpa, talking to both of you would definitely put my mind at ease too. Give me a moment and I'll have Grams come onto the phone okay? Just wait for your call back in a bit please. Thank you so much!
Sure thing, Alex. We're here for you. Take your time and we'll talk soon. Love you.
Love you too Grandpa, see you shortly. Take care.
Thanks, I will. See ya soon.
